Writing clock in Haskell

Latin Clock

My school has an eight day schedule that is hard to figure out, so I wrote a clock that would help people figure out which classes were next. My first step was to create a mock up the site using bootstrap.

Bootstrap is framework you can use to build good looking websites easily.
